ai-patthana22.31:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.31:0.3_0: used to be persuaded over the fetters, and so on.
ai-patthana22.31:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion for the donors of repulsion. Then for the sake of this misconception arises condition for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana22.31:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.31:2.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion for being easy to admonish, with uncertainty and without trouble.
ai-patthana22.31:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.31:3.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, not for the sake of flood.
ai-patthana22.31:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana22.31:5.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, not for the sake of non-greed. The teaching doesn’t give rise to repulsion.
ai-patthana22.31:5.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana22.31:7.1_0: Not for the sake of livelihood, not for the sake of repulsion. ...
ai-patthana22.31:7.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana22.31:9.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, not for the sake of another; for the sake of these, not for the sake of functionally.
ai-patthana22.31:9.1_1: This is the section in brief.
